section.title: Updating the copyright header of a source file
Why updating the copyright header of a changed file?
section.para: Most Eclipse projects insists that you update the last changed date in the copyright header if you change the file. You can do this manually but the Eclipse releng project also provides tooling for that.

section.title: Using the Eclipse releng tooling for updating the copyright header
section.para: You need to install the copyright header tool from the following update site: http://download.eclipse.org/eclipse/updates/4.5
Adjust the number "4.5" to the number matching your eclipse version.
After the installation you can select the entry from the context menu of a project or source folder.
